edu.rit.numeric

Class XYZSeries.Regression

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.numeric.XYZSeries.Regression
  • Enclosing class:
    XYZSeries

    public static class XYZSeries.Regression
extends java.lang.Object
    Class XYZSeries.Regression holds the results of a linear regression on an XYZSeries. The x and y values are the data points; each z value is the standard deviation of the measurement error in the corresponding y value, assuming the measurement error distribution is a zero-mean Gaussian. A Regression object is also a Function that can be used to evaluate the regression formula y = a + bx.
    See Also:
    XYZSeries.linearRegression()

      Chi-square merit function of the fit between the model (this Regression object) and the data (original XYZSeries object).
      double cov_ab
      Covariance in the estimates of a and b.
      double r_ab
      Coefficient of correlation between the uncertainty in a and the uncertainty in b.
      double significance
      Significance of χ2.
      double var_a
      Variance in the estimate of a.
      double var_b
      Variance in the estimate of b.
